item.title: Chuck Schumer places hold on Trump DOJ nominees over Qatari jet
item.description: Chuck Schumer places hold on Trump DOJ nominees over Qatari jet

item.title: White House announces $600 billion Saudi investment in U.S. during Trump visit
item.description: Trump's participation in the investment forum came after he signed a series of bilateral agreements with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.

item.title: Trump says U.S. will remove all sanctions on Syria
Trump tariffs face major legal hurdle as federal trade court hears challenge
item.description: Trump has long praised tariffs as a key tool for negotiating with other countries and collecting federal revenue.

item.title: Trump administration cuts an additional $450 million in grants to Harvard
item.description: The Trump administration is cutting an additional $450 million in grants to Harvard University, on top of the $2.2 billion already cut.
